title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Enhancement: Knowledge-Sharing Culture Design for Organizational Learning Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze trust-building mechanisms within organizations and explain their correlation with knowledge-sharing behaviors.
Learners can design at least three specific strategies to promote a knowledge-sharing culture in a simulated environment.
Learners can develop and apply organizational learning performance metrics through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
